header.description: Here's a mix of projects I've built or pitched in on. Each one's taught me something new or pushed me in a different way. For more stuffâ€”including experiments and work in progressâ€”check out my GitHub or resume.

featured_projects.name: Portfolio
featured_projects.custom_description: My personal website showcasing my portfolio and skills; modular and easy to maintain, I learned a lot about web-deployment and SEO, and reinforced a lot of incomplete pathways regarding frontend development generally (Your currently viewing it!)

featured_projects.name: UPlant
featured_projects.custom_description: A plant care app that helps you keep track of your plants' needs and schedules. The biggest takeaway was navigating the complexities of a team project, from initial design to final deployment. It was a great experience working with a team of 4 to build this from the ground up.

featured_projects.name: Hyprchs
featured_projects.custom_description: Collaborative AI chess tutor, designed to help players improve their skills through interactive lessons and analysis. It uses advanced machine learning techniques to provide personalized feedback and strategies. I am lucky enough to contribute to the ML side of this underneath a now friend and mentor.

featured_projects.name: TA-Scheduling-App
featured_projects.custom_description: Efficient scheduling system for teaching assistants. This was my first full fledged Django project, designed to streamline the process of assigning TAs to classes and managing their schedules. Worked in scrum with a team of 4 to build this from the ground up, and learned a ton about Django and web development in the process.

featured_projects.name: FourLakes
featured_projects.custom_description: A sleek one-page React site I built for my brother and his friends who dreamed up a boat detailing business summer-2025. It features responsive design, clean branding, and lives as a standalone route (/FourLakes) in this domain.

about.name: Beckett Frey
about.introduction:

Portfolio, Gitfolio, Software Studio Hubâ€”call it what you willâ€”Iâ€™m glad you're here. Take a look around and reach out if something catches your eye.

callToAction.title: Building with Passion, Learning with Purpose
callToAction.description: I'm actively seeking freelance opportunities to design and build websites for people and businesses. Iâ€™m always eager to learn new tools, tackle fresh challenges, and grow as a developer. Got a project in mind or just want to connect? Letâ€™s chat.
